statements: SELECT * FROM waste_generation_rates WHERE production_line_id = 1;
SELECT production_line_id, waste_type FROM waste_generation_rates WHERE waste_weight > 100;
SELECT date_generated, waste_weight FROM waste_generation_rates WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY date_generated DESC;
SELECT MAX(waste_weight) AS max_waste_weight FROM waste_generation_rates;
SELECT AVG(waste_weight) AS avg_waste_weight, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM waste_generation_rates WHERE date_generated BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM waste_generation_rates WHERE production_line_id = 1 ORDER BY date_generated DESC, waste_weight ASC;
SELECT waste_type, SUM(waste_weight) AS total_weight FROM waste_generation_rates GROUP BY waste_type HAVING total_weight > 100 ORDER BY total_weight DESC;
SELECT production_line_id, COUNT(waste_type) AS waste_count FROM waste_generation_rates WHERE date_generated > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY production_line_id ORDER BY waste_count DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT waste_type FROM waste_generation_rates WHERE waste_weight > 500 ORDER BY waste_type ASC;
SELECT AVG(waste_weight) AS average_weight, MAX(waste_weight) AS max_weight, MIN(waste_weight) AS min_weight FROM waste_generation_rates;
SELECT * FROM production_lines;
SELECT production_line_name, production_line_id FROM production_lines;
SELECT waste_id, waste_type FROM waste_generation;
SELECT production_line_id, SUM(waste_amount) AS total_waste_amount FROM waste_generation GROUP BY production_line_id;
SELECT * FROM waste_generation WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM production_lines;
SELECT production_line_name, production_line_id FROM production_lines ORDER BY production_line_name, production_line_id DESC;

SELECT production_line_name, COUNT(*) as waste_count FROM production_lines JOIN waste_generation ON production_lines.production_line_id = waste_generation.production_line_id GROUP BY production_line_name ORDER BY waste_count DESC;
SELECT MAX(waste_amount) as max_waste, MIN(waste_amount) as min_waste FROM waste_generation;

SELECT production_line_name, waste_type, SUM(waste_amount) as total_waste FROM production_lines JOIN waste_generation ON production_lines.production_line_id = waste_generation.production_line_id GROUP BY production_line_name, waste_type ORDER BY total_waste DESC;
SELECT * FROM production_lines;
SELECT production_line_name, production_line_id FROM production_lines ORDER BY production_line_id DESC;
SELECT production_line_name, waste_type, waste_amount FROM waste_generation WHERE waste_amount > 100;
SELECT production_line_id, total_waste_amount, measured_timestamp FROM waste_stats ORDER BY measured_timestamp DESC;
SELECT production_line_name, waste_type, waste_amount, timestamp FROM waste_generation WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' AND production_line_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM production_lines;
SELECT production_line_name, production_line_id FROM production_lines WHERE production_line_id > 5 ORDER BY production_line_name DESC;

SELECT production_line_name, SUM(waste_amount) AS total_waste_amount FROM production_lines JOIN waste_generation ON production_lines.production_line_id = waste_generation.production_line_id GROUP BY production_line_name;

SELECT production_lines.production_line_name, waste_stats.total_waste_amount FROM production_lines JOIN waste_stats ON production_lines.production_line_id = waste_stats.production_line_id ORDER BY total_waste_amount DESC;
SELECT production_line_id, production_line_name FROM production_lines WHERE production_line_id IN (SELECT production_line_id FROM waste_generation WHERE waste_type='Plastic');
SELECT * FROM production_lines;
SELECT production_line_name, production_line_id FROM production_lines ORDER BY production_line_id DESC;
SELECT waste_type, waste_weight FROM waste_generation WHERE production_line_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM production_rate WHERE production_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT disposal_date, disposal_method FROM waste_disposal ORDER BY disposal_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM production_lines;
SELECT production_line_name, production_line_id FROM production_lines ORDER BY production_line_id DESC;
SELECT production_line_name, COUNT(production_line_id) AS total_production_lines FROM production_lines GROUP BY production_line_name;
SELECT * FROM production_rate WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT waste_id, waste_type, SUM(waste_weight) AS total_waste_weight FROM waste_generation GROUP BY waste_id, waste_type ORDER BY total_waste_weight DESC;
SELECT * FROM production_line;
SELECT id, line_name FROM production_line ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT p.line_name, w.type_name, wm.weight FROM production_line p INNER JOIN waste_bin w ON p.id = w.line_id INNER JOIN waste_measurement wm ON w.id = wm.bin_id;
SELECT p.line_name, ps.total_waste, ps.measurement_date FROM production_line p INNER JOIN production_stats ps ON p.id = ps.line_id WHERE ps.total_waste > 100;
SELECT DISTINCT w.type_name FROM waste_type w;
SELECT * FROM production_line WHERE id = 1;
SELECT line_name FROM production_line ORDER BY line_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_measurement WHERE weight > 50 ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT type_name, weight FROM waste_type JOIN waste_measurement ON waste_type.id = waste_measurement.type_id WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY weight ASC;
SELECT line_id, SUM(total_waste) AS total_waste_sum FROM production_stats GROUP BY line_id HAVING total_waste_sum > 500;
